name: Supabase CLI
description: Installs the Supabase CLI and optional helper scripts for managing local stacks.

version.description: Version of the Supabase CLI to install (npm tag or semver).

manageLocalStack.description: Install helper scripts (sbx-start/stop/status) for managing Supabase local stack.

services.description: Comma-separated list of Supabase services used by the project (for metadata only).

projectRef.description: Supabase project reference (exported as SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF if provided).

cacheDir.description: Directory containing pre-downloaded Supabase CLI .deb and checksum files for offline installation.

offline.description: Skip external network requests; requires cacheDir assets and pre-installed dependencies.
